title: Lenovo Smart Clock Review: Your Voice Is The Snooze Button
description:
Typical alarm clock from Walmart: about $12. 

Lenovo Smart Clock with Google Assistant: $79. 

Being able to shout "STOP!" at your alarm clock at 7am to snooze it: priceless. 

The Lenovo Smart Clock is like a Google Home Mini, mashed together with a smartphone screen from 2010, inside a box covered in carpet. It does almost everything a Google Home Mini can do, but falls well short of the functionality of something like a Nest Home Hub – and that shortfall is intentional. Find out who this thing is for (and see what it's like to make a phone call from an alarm clock) in MrMobile's Lenovo Smart Clock Review!
